about.who.text1: We are VERIAL SOFT, a company dedicated since 1990 to providing users with software solutions that meet the demands of the market, offering high quality professional solutions for a wide range of industries, including hospitality, retail, food and beverage, bookstores, and others.
about.who.text2: Our solutions are designed to address the unique challenges faced by these industries, such as managing complex supply chains, accounting, providing excellent customer service, etc.
about.who.text3: We have a staff of experienced professionals, distributed among the following departments: programming, quality control, technical support, marketing and communication, design, sales, Internet, training and administration.
about.slogan: A reference brand for companies and a reliable technology partner
about.clients.text1: Verial Soft has a wide portfolio of clients, thanks to its network of distributors that allow the implementation and services of all its solutions at a national level.
about.clients.text2: This distribution policy makes it possible to establish close relationships between the end customer, the distributor and the manufacturer, in order to be able to implement effective management solutions.
